栚字的基本解释

栚
zhèn
架着蚕箔的横木。
山矾，常绿灌木或小乔木，叶互生，革质，果实可以榨油，叶烧灰可代替白矾做媒染剂，木材可做家具。

栚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhèn］
［《廣韻》直稔切，上寢，澄。］
搁架蚕箔的横木。

栚字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　栚； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页522第11
【說文】作?。省作?。通作栚。直荏切，音朕。槌之橫者。　又【六書故】山樊也。染者用其葉燒灰，以藏所染之色。?字所从的灷下从?作。

栚字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
栚字的起名意思

指山矾，常绿灌木或小乔木，木材可做家具。

Yan
Basic explanation of words
Yan
zhèn
A horizontal bar of silkworm foil.
Alum, evergreen shrubs or small trees, alternate leaves, leathery, the fruit can be squeezed oil, the burnt leaves can replace alum as a mordant, and wood can be used as furniture.
Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhèn］
["Guangyun" cut straight, go to bed, clear. ]
Shelves the horizontal wood of silkworm foil.
Yan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　栚; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 522 No. 11
[Said the text] For?. Province for?. Pass for Yan. Cut straight, sound Zhen. The cross of the mallet.　[The Story of the Six Books] Shanfan also. The dyer burns the ashes with its leaves to hide the dyed color. The word from which the word is written.
Yan
